data.name: Deliver Us From Evil (DUFE) - Masquerade
data.detailed_description: Deliver Us From Evil: Masquerade is a short and sweet BL visual novel with two POVs. Insecurities can bring out the worst in anyone—including Keldran and Ace, centuries-long friends with benefits. What starts off as a fun haunted house trip soon turns sinister, as they find themselves at the mercy of a ravenous spirit that wears their faces. If they cannot navigate their unspoken feelings and conquer their fears, they may find themselves as nothing more than silent spirits, wandering the halls forever.
data.about_the_game: Deliver Us From Evil: Masquerade is a short and sweet BL visual novel with two POVs. Insecurities can bring out the worst in anyone—including Keldran and Ace, centuries-long friends with benefits. What starts off as a fun haunted house trip soon turns sinister, as they find themselves at the mercy of a ravenous spirit that wears their faces. If they cannot navigate their unspoken feelings and conquer their fears, they may find themselves as nothing more than silent spirits, wandering the halls forever.
data.short_description: Deliver Us From Evil: Masquerade is a short and sweet BL visual novel. Keldran and Ace are two centuries-long friends with benefits. What starts off as a fun haunted house trip soon turns sinister and If they cannot conquer their fears, they may find themselves wandering the halls forever.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 3

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.10+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo (64 bit only)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 3

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 3
